history.proof: constructor. - unfold Reflexive. intros. sfirstorder depth: 3use: PreOrder, incl_app, incl_nil. - unfold Transitive. intros. sfirstorder depth: 3use: PreOrder, incl_app, incl_nil.

exceptions.exn: Cannot turn inductive PreOrder into an evaluable reference.
In environment X : Type x : list X a : ?M1620 Unable to unify "a el []" with "a el x".
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment X : Type x, y, z : list X H : x <<= y H0 : y <<= z a : ?M1620 Unable to unify "(fix In (a : ?M1620) (l : list ?M1620) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) a (?M1621 ++ ?M1622)" with "(fix In (a : X) (l : list X) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) a x".

original: intros X. unfold PreOrder. constructor. - unfold Reflexive. intros. apply incl_nil. - unfold Transitive. intros. apply incl_app; auto.
